sentences: James Richard Griffin (born January 28, 1940, in Jackson, Mississippi) is an American jazz trombonist known for his work on Strata-East Records, and with Rahsaan Roland Kirk.
After earning his bachelor's degree in 1963, Griffin began teaching high school while working on his Master's.
Later in life, Griffin became an accomplished painter, with showings in New York City and Europe.
